name: EMPOWER
briefDescription: Empower trust was registered in 2008 with a view to set up a non-profit mental health unit in Guntur town to serve the population of Guntur and surrounding districts. The main aim is to develop a comprehensive mental health service that is accessible, responsive, individualised and systematic through a comprehensive mental healthcare facility. In addition to clinical work, the trust aims to reduce stress in students and to prevent suicides. It also conducts programmes to raise awareness in mental health and to reduce stigma against mental health. Cessation of smoking and use of tobacco products, camps to raise awareness of harmful effects of tobacco and alcohol, raising awareness about dementia are also part of campaign.
